00025 #include <physics/FlattenCollider>
00026 
00027 #include <physics/CollidableBody>
00028 
00029 using base::dynamic_cast_ref;
00030 
00031 using physics::FlattenCollider;
00032 using physics::Collider;
00033 using physics::Collidable;
00034 using physics::CollidableBody;
00035 using physics::CollidableGroup;
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039 void FlattenCollider::collideGroupWithBody(ref<const CollidableGroup> group, ref<const CollidableBody> collidableBody)
00040 {
00041   // collide each element of the group with the body
00042   CollidableGroup::const_iterator_const c = group->const_begin();
00043   CollidableGroup::const_iterator_const end = group->const_end();
00044   while (c != end) {
00045     collide(*c, collidableBody); 
00046     ++c;
00047   }
00048   
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 void FlattenCollider::collide(ref<const Collidable> collidable1, ref<const Collidable> collidable2)
00053 {
00054   if (!enabled) return;
00055   
00056   if (instanceof(*collidable1, const CollidableBody) && instanceof(*collidable2, const CollidableBody))
00057       notifyListeners(collidable1, collidable2); // both bodies
00058     
00059   if (instanceof(*collidable1, const CollidableGroup) && instanceof(*collidable2, const CollidableGroup)) {
00060     // both groups
00061     
00062     ref<const CollidableGroup> group1(dynamic_cast_ref<const CollidableGroup>(collidable1));
00063     ref<const CollidableGroup> group2(dynamic_cast_ref<const CollidableGroup>(collidable2));
00064  
00065     // collide each element of the first group with the whole second group
00066     CollidableGroup::const_iterator_const c = group1->const_begin();
00067     CollidableGroup::const_iterator_const end = group1->const_end();
00068     while (c != end) {
00069       ref<const CollidableBody> body(dynamic_cast_ref<const CollidableBody>(*c));
00070       collideGroupWithBody(group2, body); 
00071       ++c;
00072     }
00073    
00074     // collide each the elements of the groups among themselves
00075     collide(group1);
00076     collide(group2);
00077     
00078 }
00079   else {
00080     // one of each, make the group the first one
00081     if (instanceof(*collidable1, const CollidableBody))
00082       base::swap(collidable1, collidable2);
00083     
00084     // now collidable1 is group & collidable2 is a body
00085     // Collide each group element with the body
00086     
00087     ref<const CollidableGroup> group(dynamic_cast_ref<const CollidableGroup>(collidable1));
00088     ref<const CollidableBody>  body(dynamic_cast_ref<const CollidableBody>(collidable2));
00089     
00090     collideGroupWithBody(group, body);
00091 
00092     collide(group); // and collide trhe group elements among themselves
00093     
00094   }
00095 
00096 }
